original_text: More and more people everywhere will be doing very bad things. Because of this, many people will no longer love each other in the way that they did before.
korean_text: 불법이 성하므로 많은 사람의 사랑이 식어지리라

sentences.original_text: will be doing very bad things
many people will no longer love each other
sentences.korean_translation: 많은 사람들이 더 이상 서로를 사랑하지 않을 것입니다

sentences.original_text: in the way that they did before
